review: 주차장이 협소해서 금방 자리가 찬다는게 단점이구요. 국립중앙박물관 지하주차장을 이용하시는게 좋아요. 걸어오는 산책코스가 멋집니다

It's also great for picnics with mats and so on. The parking lot is small, but you can park and walk in the parking lot of the National Museum of Korea or the Hangeul Museum nearby.

review: 뒤에가 미군부대였어서 자연이 훼손이 안되 산책길로 좋습니다. 옆에는 국립중앙박물관이 있어서 관람후에 한바뀌 돌아보세요.

It's clean and good when it blooms. There were a lot of people visiting on a family basis. The atmosphere was not loud and nice. I want to go again next time

Also, there are Itaewon, Gyeongridan-gil, etc. near here, so it is good to look around together.

It is good because there are various and small things to enjoy such as playground, pond, and playground. It's a bit disappointing to see the fall foliage.

review: 친구들하고 여름에 소풍으로 갔던곳이예요 공원이 넓은편이라 아무대나 돗자리 피기는 좋아요 사람도 많긴했는데 자리만잘잡으면 괜찮아요

review_en: It's a beautiful park. On weekends, it is crowded with families who enjoy picnics or play games. You can walk straight to the National Museum of Korea and there is another small park inside the museum.

review_en: It is the best place to spend the whole day leisurely as a family unit to match the name 'Yongsan Family Park'. I could see many couples and family members in this area. There are so many trees that you can enjoy the real nature. If you feel tired in Seoul, it would be nice to spend some time here.

review: 나는 아주 추웠지만 토요일에 바로 거기에 있었고 나의 산책을 즐겼다. 많은 꽃이 피고있었습니다. 그것은 바쁜 것이 아니었고 그렇게 쉽게 도달 할 수있었습니다. 용산 역에서 그리 멀지 않은 곳. 기차 나 택시를 탈 수 있습니다. 나는 그 날에 내가 방문한 한글 국립 박물관 앞에서 버스를 타고 바로 내렸다. 바스트 스톱은 공원 바로 앞에 있습니다. 이 공원은 한글 박물관과 내가 여러 번 방문한 국립 중앙 박물관을 연결한다.

You can take a train or a taxi. I got off the bus right in front of the Hangeul National Museum I visited on that day. The Bast stop is right in front of the park. This park connects the Hangeul Museum with the National Museum of Korea, which I have visited many times.

review_en: My husband and I often had a pleasant experience on foot in this park. There are many well-maintained walking paths, outdoor sculptures and plantations, picnic sites, and generally a peaceful atmosphere. It is often not crowded. We took pictures of motherhood working here during the cherry blossom season in Seoul, and we were very satisfied with that picture. It is a undervalued park where you can see cherry blossoms and beautiful trees.
